how.title: How it works: Your developer in 3 simple steps

0.title: Create request via our platform
0.text: Log into our system and create a detailed search request. Define tech stack, experience level, project duration and special requirements directly in the interface.

1.title: AI matching & candidate review
1.text: Our system analyzes your request and automatically matches suitable candidates from our talent pool. You receive a curated list with 3-5 top matches directly in the platform within 48h.

2.title: Interview management & onboarding
2.text: Appointment booking, interview coordination and contract processing run completely through the platform. After your selection we handle complete onboarding and setup.
